name: Missed
description:
Shooter game where each player controls a character. Nevertheless, no one knows who he is in the bunch of AI characters. 

You win if you reach the loot before the other human players. But take care not to get caught by running too fast or having a weird behavior.

Prevent your friends from winning by shooting them. But your bullets are limited, so be sure you don't miss and kill the wrong target.

Inspired by the game Hidden in Plain Sight, Missed is still in development and will to improve. The game will soon have a 2v2 mode and will be playable online.

2-4 players.

WARNING !! The game is only playable with Xbox Controllers and can't be played alone.

Feel free to give reviews or to advice for new functionnalities or bugs.
